price: Ano ang mayroon sa inyo na hindi kayo umaasam kay Allāh sa kabunyian
arabic: مَّا لَكُمۡ لَا تَرۡجُونَ لِلَّهِ وَقَارٗا

version.title: Filipino (Tagalog) Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Tagalog by Rowwad Translation Center with cooperation with Islamhouse.com

meta.transliteration: mā lakum lā tarjūna lillahi waqāran
